thread.title: BRIEF-Organigram Says Expects Harvests From Phase 2 Expansion To Begin Third Week Of April

title: BRIEF-Organigram Says Expects Harvests From Phase 2 Expansion To Begin Third Week Of April
text: March 6, 2018 / 11:18 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Organigram Says Expects Harvests From Phase 2 Expansion To Begin Third Week Of April Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 6 (Reuters) - Organigram Holdings Inc: * ORGANIGRAM REPORTS HEALTH CANADA APPROVAL OF NEW GROW ROOMS, INCREASED YIELDS AND UPWARD REVISION TO PRODUCTION CAPACITY FORECASTS * ORGANIGRAM HOLDINGS INC - EXPECTS HARVESTS FROM PHASE 2 EXPANSION TO BEGIN THIRD WEEK OF APRIL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
